dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and shading, and depths by bathymetric soundings.
Bar scale on map given in "Kilometer[s]."
Title translation: Physical map of Africa.
Shows topography, elevation, drainage, islands surrounding continent, water depths.
Appears in Winkler Prins Encyclopedie, Amsterdam: Elsevier, 1905.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
